coreAttributes.name: Orcish Meat Buns
coreAttributes.description: A buns of sourdough bread rolled with a delicious, spicy meat and cheese filling, baked stuck together like dinner rolls. Popular among no-nonsense orcs, it is simple to prepare and very calorie dense, and very satisfying to pull apart and eat.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] a meat bun away from its loaf, and [npc.verb(stuff)] it into [npc.her] mouth. [npc.She] eagerly [npc.verb(start)] wolfing them all down in moments, greedily grabbing handfuls at a time.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] a meat bun away from the loaf [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.verb(breathe)] in the savory aroma. Unable to resist the delicious-looking snack, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] wolfing it all down in moments, greedily grabbing handfuls of bread right off the loaf in your hand.
